snippet: The extremist Islamist group Boko Haram has released a video that shows charred plane wreckage and the beheading of a man identified as a pilot of a missing Nigerian Air Force jet.
abstract: Extremist Islamist group Boko Haram releases video showing charred plane wreckage and the beheading of a man identified as a pilot of a missing Nigerian Air Force jet, supporting group's claims that it shot down a fighter plane.
lead_paragraph: The extremist Islamist group Boko Haram has released a video that shows charred plane wreckage and the beheading of a man identified as a pilot of a missing Nigerian Air Force jet.

headline.main: Nigeria: Grisly Claim by Boko Haram
headline.print_headline: Nigeria: Grisly Claim by Boko Haram
